body:
Yo!

Maybe someone knows me already from other servers, but now im here on avicu introducing myself.

So, my name is....? Gr8! Tony! Im german and I currently live on Spain, in Barcelona. Im 16, in a while 17, years old. Im calm and mature and I like clean gameplay!

I really enjoy music, so much, that I bought a program called FLSTudio and now im producing music.

My music interest are this ones ---> EDM, Melbourne Bounce, Hardstyle and Hardcore Heavy Metal 

Im pretty much a gamer, so you can play with me on Steam If you want!

I got a PS4 and a laptop with almost All Call of Duty's, Assasins Creed etc...

On the PC I like Minecraft and CS:GO...

Profesionally, I want to get Graphic Designer, not like now, more like a job.

If you want a banner or something just go to ----> https://avicus.net/forums/6e2783db5

title: Introducing.... TonyGFX!
